divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the parking lot of Target and out of the corner of my eye across the tops of some trees I saw all there bright lights. I looked closer and there were 7 lights around a triangle shaped flying object. This was not my first time seeing something like this, but I was so surprised! It started to bank away from me and thats the point at which I could see the formation of lights on the bottom of it. This aircraft looked very big. It was about 3 times the size of a stealth bomber. And the lights were totally different than those of a stealth bomber At first sighting, I though this was just an ordinary aircraft. But upon further examination, it was clear that this was not an ordinary aircraft. I finally lost sight of the object when it got behind the tree line
trends: There have been no other sightings in Montgomeryville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 7 white lights forming a triangle under a triangle shaped UFO
